transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Haan boliye na.

Customer: Haan ji sir good morning main Smriti baat kar rahi h India Mart se.

Executive: Hmm hmm boliye aapka number save hai boliye na.

Customer: Haan ji sir basically na sir aap se baat karni thi like thoda sa ek google meet pe aaj aa sakte hain sir aap.

Executive: Hmm?

Customer: Google meet pe aaj aap aa sakte hain sir google meet pe.

Executive: Haan aa sakta hu but abhi to thoda sa kam ka pressure hai.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Kis kis regarding aap google meet me chah rahe hain boliye.

Customer: Sir ye bylete consume karane ke sir.

Executive: Oh acha acha ha thik hai rukiye zara main na aapko 10 minute me call karta hu thik hai.

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: 10 minute me aapko call karta hu.

Customer: Sir to sir thik hai na aap ek minute matlab na aap mujhe time thoda sa nahi call kar lenge agar aap matlab ek second half me bhi agar aap thoda sa time nikal sakte hain to thik hai agar possible hai to sir.

Executive: Haan possible to hai possible hai main wohi chah raha tha ki 10 minute me google meet me join karunga.

Executive: Isliye aapko bol raha hu 10 minute me main wapas call karta hu aapko.

Customer: Aawaz cut cut ke aa rahi hai sir aapki.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Sunai de raha hai?

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Haan sunai de raha hai?

Customer: Ji main aapko message karu fir se whatsapp
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to connect on Google Meet.

- Customer has work pressure.

- Customer's voice is breaking.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back in 10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- google meet, buyleads, call back
